title: Top Places to visit in West Tripura, Agartala, Tripura
content:
West Tripura is an administrative district in the state of Tripura in India. The district headquarters are located at Agartala. As of 2012 it is the most populous district of Tripura (out of 8).

Top Places to visit in South Tripura, Belonia, Tripura
content:
South Tripura is an administrative district in the state of Tripura in northeastern India.

title: Top Places to visit in Sepahijala, Bishramganj, Tripura
content: Sepahijala District is a district of Tripura, India. This district was created in January 2012 when four new districts were established in Tripura, taking the number of districts in the state from four to eight. title: Top Places to visit in North Tripura, Dharmanagar, Tripura
content:
North Tripura is an administrative district in the state of Tripura in India. The district headquarters are located at Dharmanagar. The district occupies an area of 1422.19 km² and has a population of 693,947 (as of 2011).

title: Top Places to visit in Khowai, Tripura
content: Khowai district is a district of Tripura state of India. title: Top Places to visit in Gomati, Udaipur, Tripura
content:
Gomati district is a district of Tripura, India. This district was created in January 2012 when four new districts were created in Tripura, taking the number of districts in the state from four to eight.
Udaipur is its headquarters.

title: Top Places to visit in Dhalai, Ambassa, Tripura
content:
Dhalai is an administrative district in the state of Tripura in India. The district headquarters are in Ambassa. As of 2011 it was the least populous district of Tripura (out of 8), although it is the largest district in the state.
